page.title: 05New Owners country fare shop
page.content: My Dad said "these shelves need filling up" and he asked me to help. We started in the Off Licence first because it was opening at 7 p.m. that night. I stocked up the sweets and my Dad stocked up the beers and spirits. We had everthing the customers wanted. We started to work in the from of the shop where we sell newspapers, sweets, groceries and cigarettes. We went straight to bed because we had to get up at 5.30 a.m. for the papers. The 5 paper boys arrive early and wait outside until we open at 6 a.m. We close at 9 p.m. My Dad is going to change the times. We now have the front shop open from 6 a.m. until 6 p.m. The Off Licence is open until 7.30 p.m. until 9 p.m. j
